title: Innovalab with IMT Cusco
text:
Welcome to Cusco project üó∫Ô∏èüêåüïπÔ∏èüöÅ!



 This website showcases data visualizations on snails, water bodies, Fasciola hepatica cases , environmental indices,temperature, and other data collected in the TMRC project.The primary objective is to characterize the microenvironment of communities  in Cusco using high-resolution images, including processed images from multispectral and thermal drones.These tools enable us to identify potential areas for water body formation and snail proliferation, there by contributing to the understanding and management of these phenomena in the local environment. 












The first fieldwork

A collection of charts, infographics and dataviz designs created for previous projects & community-driven data challenges.
